Scented with natural coconut for a true beach vibe- no matter where your adventures may happen. What else you should know: Remember, your sunscreen only works if you use it correctly! Shake this can well as it contains suspended minerals that you need for best results. Apply liberally to all exposed skin. SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. And while our sunscreens apply evenly and can have a more translucent look, they work as a block and you need to cover your skin completely for effective results. What else you should know: Every true beauty knows it's what's on the inside that matters.Formulated without petroleum, parabens, silicones, retinyl palmitate, phthalates & chemical UV absorbers.Directions. description:
Soak in gorgeous skin! Naturally you can count on Alba Botanica to deliver botanically-infused alternatives to the latest home beauty craze to hit the continent in years. These innovative and convenient treatments are individually wrapped, serum-soaked fiber masks that contour to your face to deliver concentrated doses of active botanical ingredients. To use, simply lay a mask over your face and smooth around curves. After 5 to 15 minutes of intense kin rehab, simply dispose of the mask, massage the remaining serum into skin and smile at your complexion. Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business. With our products, the way that we make them, and how we treat others, we want to inspire and uplift women from head to soul.

Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. And while our sunscreens apply evenly and can have a more translucent look, they work as a block and you need to cover your skin completely for effective results. description:
CōTZ Sensitive is ideal for special skin types & conditions. Keeps harmful UV rays from touching or penetrating the skin, while soothing sensitive and easily-irritated skin. Soft & sheer with just what you need to protect your sensitive skin and no more, including the #1 rated sun protection ingredient against burning and aging UVA-UVB rays.

Dermatologist Recommended & Gentle enough for special skin types & conditions:
- Laser, Cosmetic Surgery, Microdermabrasion, Acid, Peel
- Acne, Rosacea
- Psoriasis, Eczema, Lupus/Rheumatology
- Sun-Sensitive due to medical procedure & medications

A Gentle Mineral Complex that helps prevent heat build-up in the skin, which can damage the dermis. CōTZ helps prevent pre-mature skin aging (fine lines, wrinkles, sagging, age spots), uneven skin tone and other serious problems.

CōTZ sits invisibly on top of the skin and functions like thousands of mirrors to deflect UVA-UVB rays before the rays can touch or penetrate the skin.

CōTZ is 100% Free of chemical sunscreen ingredients, here’s why: Chemical sunscreens absorb UVA-UVB rays into the skin and transform the rays into heat, which can damage the dermis.

CōTZ Sensitive for Healthier skin:
- 100% Free of Oils, Chemical Sunscreens, Oils, Fragrances, Preservatives, PABA, Gluten, Phthalates
- Will not irritate or sting
- Contains #1 and #2 rated sun protection ingredients for UVA-UVB rays
- SPF 40 exceeds the level recommended by Skin Cancer experts
- Provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection
- Photostable, will not breakdown when exposed to sunlight
- Water Resistant (40 Minutes)
- Non-Greasy
- Not tested on animals

description:
Best for: Normal or dry skin

2014, 2015 & 2016 Allure Best of Beauty Award Winner.

This set includes 5 of nügg’s high performance, single-use Hydrating face masks to intensively hydrate and replenish dry, de-hydrated skin in just 5 to 15 minutes. It is formulated with 94% natural or naturally-derived ingredients and with a powerful blend of precious natural oils and extracts. Key ingredients include Camellia Seed Oil, Spirulina Extract, Aloe Juice and Glycerin to intensely hydrate skin and help skin retain moisture. Masks are formulated without petrochemicals, synthetic fragrances, synthetic colors, sulfates and parabens. Each of the 5 facial masks in the pack comes in a unique single serve capsule (made from recyclable PETG) which protects the formula from oxidation and also makes the masks highly travel friendly. nügg’s break-through natural oil dispersion skin care technology enhances the mask’s efficacy and eliminates the need for possibly damaging active chemical emulsifiers.

How to use: Apply entire contents of the pod to skin (applies like a smooth gel), leaving out lips and eye area. Leave on skin for 5 to 15 minutes before rinsing off or removing with a damp washcloth.
You can also use the face mask as an overnight skin boosting mask by applying a thin layer onto the skin, leaving on the skin overnight and washing it off in the morning. Tape capsule shut and store in a zip lock bag and use leftover product within the next few days. Use as often as desired.

Ingredients: ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, GLYCERIN, DIMETHICONE, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, CAMELLIA SINENSIS SEED OIL, SPIRULINA MAXIMA EXTRACT, GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, LINUM USITATISSIMUM (LINSEED) SEED OIL, VACCINIUM MACROCARPON (CRANBERRY) SEED OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, ROSA CANINA SEED OIL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, CARBOMER, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, PHENOXYETHANOL, XANTHAN GUM, HYDROGENATED PHOSPHATIDYLCHOLINE, HYDROXYLATED LECITHIN, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) SEED OIL, BORAGO OFFICINALIS SEED OIL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) OIL, LAVANDULA LATIFOLIA OIL, MENTHA PIPERITA (PEPPERMINT) OIL.

description:
Best for: Dull & tired skin and skin that is in need for refreshment.

2014 Allure Best of Beauty Award Winner.

This set includes 5 of nügg’s high performance single use Revitalizing face masks to help revitalize and plump dull, tired skin for a radiant, dewy look in just 5 to 10 minutes. It is formulated with 95% natural or naturally-derived ingredients and with a powerful blend of precious natural oils and extracts. Key ingredients include Peppermint Oil to help provide a radiant, dewy glow, as well as Flaxseed Oil which has a high level of omega 3 which is known for it’s antioxidant properties and helps to plump the skin.

Masks are formulated without petrochemicals, synthetic fragrances, synthetic colors, sulfates and parabens. Each of the 5 facial masks in the pack comes in a unique single serve capsule (made from recyclable PETG) which protects the formula from oxidation and also makes the masks highly travel friendly. nügg’s break-through natural oil dispersion skin care technology enhances the mask’s efficacy and eliminates the need for possibly damaging active chemical emulsifiers.

Directions of use: Apply content of the cup generously to skin (applies like a smooth gel), leaving out lips and eye area. Leave on skin for 5 to 10 minutes before rinsing off or removing with a damp washcloth. Use as often as desired.

description:
Best for: Sensitive or troubled skin.

2015 & 2016 Allure Best of Beauty Award Winner

This set includes 5 of nügg’s high performance single-use soothing face masks to help calm, balance and hydrate troubled or sensitive skin in just 5 to 15 minutes. It is formulated with 94% natural or naturally-derived ingredients and with a powerful blend of precious natural oils and extracts. Key ingredients include Chamomile extract, Shea Butter and Bisabolol to help calm & balance the skin, as well as Glycerin and Aloe Juice to hydrate and help soften skin.

Masks are formulated without petrochemicals, synthetic fragrances, synthetic colors, sulfates and parabens. Each of the 5 facial masks in the pack comes in a unique single serve capsule (made from recyclable PETG) which protects the formula from oxidation and also makes the masks highly travel friendly.
nügg’s break-through natural oil dispersion skin care technology enhances the mask’s efficacy and eliminates the need for possibly damaging active chemical emulsifiers.

How to Use: Apply entire contents of the pod to skin (applies like a smooth gel), leaving out lips and eye area. Leave on skin for 5 to 15 minutes before rinsing off or removing with a damp washcloth.
You can also use the face mask as an overnight skin boosting mask by applying a thin layer onto the skin, leaving on the skin overnight and washing it off in the morning. If you use the soothing mask as overnight sleep mask, tape capsule shut and store in a zip lock bag and use leftover product within the next few days. Use as often as desired.

Ingredients: ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, GLYCERIN, DIMETHICONE, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), LINUM USITATISSIMUM (LINSEED) SEED OIL, VACCINIUM MACROCARPON (CRANBERRY) SEED OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, ROSA CANINA SEED OIL, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) SEED OIL, BORAGO OFFICINALIS SEED OIL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL, BISABOLOL, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, CARBOMER, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, XANTHAN GUM, GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, HYDROGENATED PHOSPHATIDYLCHOLINE, HYDROXYLATED LECITHIN, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) OIL, LAVANDULA LATIFOLIA OIL, MENTHA PIPERITA (PEPPER MINT) OIL.

description:
Best for: All skin types.

2014 & 2015 Allure Best of Beauty Award Winner.

This set includes 5 of nügg’s high performance, single-use Deep Cleansing face masks for a clean, shine-free look and a soft skin feel in just 5 to 15 minutes. It is formulated with 98% natural or naturally-derived ingredients and with a powerful blend of precious natural oils and extracts. Key ingredients include Witch Hazel extract and Cucumber extract which act as astringents to reduce the appearance of pore size, Jojoba Lite Oil to help dissolve sebum in a gentle, healthy way and Aloe Juice and Glycerin to hydrate and soothe skin. The result of this 3-in-1 face mask action is clean yet well hydrated, soothed and silky-matte skin!

nügg facial masks are formulated without petrochemicals, synthetic fragrances, synthetic colors, sulfates and parabens. Each of the 5 facial masks in the pack comes in a unique single serve capsule (made from recyclable PETG) which protects the formula from oxidation and also makes the masks highly travel friendly. nügg’s break-through natural oil dispersion skin care technology enhances the mask’s efficacy and eliminates the need for possibly damaging active chemical emulsifiers.

description: C the Change® Ester C® serum contains a generous mix of potent antioxidants, including patented Vitamin Ester C®, to stimulate collagen production, refine wrinkles, and heal and rebuild damaged skin. Declining levels of Vitamin C make skin tissue less flexible and resilient and slows down the repair and synthesis of collagen. Ester C® is the most stable and effective form of Vitamin C, and in our special serum it goes to work immediately. Antioxidants are a group of compounds that deactivate single oxygen molecules, more commonly referred to as free radicals. Antioxidants bind with the free radicals before it can join with a healthy cell. This protects the skin cells against oxidative damage. They are essential to good health and are found naturally in many fruits and vegetables. Free radicals are the natural by-products of many processes within and among cells. They can also be caused by exposure to environmental stresses, including pollution, smoking and UV rays. A free radical has an unpaired electron, which makes it very unstable. Once the oxygen molecule loses an electron, it tries to stabilize itself by taking another electron from a healthy molecule. If left unchecked, free radicals can cause major damage to healthy cells. Using products rich in antioxidants will help slow the oxidative damage done to cells by free radicals. Ester C® is the stabilized form of Vitamin C that reacts very slowly with oxygen and can be used topically. It helps stimulate the growth of collagen and elastin, which are vital to the skin’s youthful appearance. C the Change® Ester C® serum not only contains Ester C® and other ingredients rich in Vitamin C, but it also has rich sources of Vitamin E. Vitamin E is a potent antioxidant whose effectiveness is enhanced when used along with Vitamin C. It is important to use a topical antioxidant serum along with taking antioxidant supplements to maximize their effectiveness. Antioxidants taken internally do not reach the top layers of the skin, so using a topical antioxidant treatment will ensure that you get the full benefits. Recommended for all skin types. Also recommended for mature skin.
title: Kiss My Face Potent and Pure Ester C® Serum - 1 oz

description: Balancing Toner revitalizes tired skin with its blend of grapefruit and orange essential oils, ginger and lemon balmextracts. Seaweed extract provides trace minerals while antioxidants Ester C® and Vitamin E protect skin from free radical damage. Using Balancing Toner after cleansing will remove excess cleanser and prepare the skin for moisturizing. Toner is the unsung hero of your face care regimen. Even after a thorough rinsing, trace amounts of cleanser remain on your face and can clog your pores and make your skins texture look rough and uneven. Using a toner on a cotton pad helps to remove the excess traces of cleanser, dirt and makeup that may be left on your skin after you cleanse. Doing this prepares your skin for any topical serums and moisturizers you choose to apply, since only the cleanest, freshest and newest skin is on the surface. There is no barrier preventing full absorption of topical vitamin serums, such as C the Change® Ester C® Serum. Balancing Toner is also your first line of defense against free radical damage. It is rich in antioxidant ingredients such as organic white tea, Ester C® andpanthenol (natural Vitamin B), which all work to repair or prevent free radical damage to the skin. Using them in conjunction increases their effectiveness, helping you achieve a more youthful appearance. Made with 78% Certified Organic ingredients. Recommended for all skin types.
